expressions.context: ___ social media is the spread of misinformation
expressions.fullSentence: One of the disadvantages of social media is the spread of misinformation.
examples: One of the disadvantages of remote work is reduced team collaboration.
One of the disadvantages of urbanization is increased pollution.

expressions.context: ___ nuclear energy is the issue of radioactive waste
expressions.fullSentence: One of the arguments against nuclear energy is the issue of radioactive waste.
examples: One of the arguments against standardized testing is that it narrows curriculum.
One of the arguments against globalization is the loss of local culture.

expressions.fullSentence: One of the problems is the high cost of implementation.
expressions.note: More direct than 'disadvantage' - suggests something needs fixing
examples: One of the problems is the lack of qualified personnel.
One of the problems is insufficient funding for research.

expressions.context: Excessive screen time ___ various health problems
expressions.fullSentence: Excessive screen time can lead to various health problems.
expressions.pattern: Subject + can lead to + noun/noun phrase
examples: Poor diet can lead to serious health complications.
Lack of exercise can lead to obesity and heart disease.

expressions.context: Strict regulations ___ companies from innovating quickly
expressions.fullSentence: Strict regulations prevent companies from innovating quickly.
expressions.usage: Showing how something stops or blocks progress
examples: Bureaucracy prevents organizations from adapting swiftly.
Fear of failure prevents many people from taking risks.

expressions.context: ___ standardized testing is that it doesn't measure creativity
expressions.fullSentence: One criticism about standardized testing is that it doesn't measure creativity.
examples: One criticism about modern education is its focus on memorization.
One criticism about capitalism is income inequality.

expressions.fullSentence: Fast fashion results in massive environmental pollution.
examples: Deforestation results in loss of biodiversity.
Poor planning results in project delays and cost overruns.

expressions.context: ___ artificial intelligence is potential job displacement
expressions.fullSentence: One negative aspect of artificial intelligence is potential job displacement.
expressions.usage: More neutral than 'problem' - good for balanced tone
examples: One negative aspect of tourism is environmental degradation.
One negative aspect of social media is privacy concerns.

expressions.context: Bureaucracy ___ people from starting their own businesses
expressions.fullSentence: Bureaucracy discourages people from starting their own businesses.
expressions.usage: Shows how something reduces motivation or willingness
examples: High taxes discourage foreign investment.
Negative feedback discourages students from participating.

expressions.context: ___ working from home is social isolation
expressions.fullSentence: A drawback of working from home is social isolation.
examples: A drawback of electric vehicles is limited charging infrastructure.
A drawback of online learning is reduced personal interaction.

expressions.context: Traffic congestion ___ economic development in major cities
expressions.fullSentence: Traffic congestion hinders economic development in major cities.
expressions.usage: Shows how something blocks or slows progress
examples: Lack of funding hinders scientific research.
Political instability hinders foreign investment.
